00032 int u_copy(const char *src, const char *dst)
00033 {
00034     FILE *sfp = NULL, *dfp = NULL;
00035     size_t c;
00036     char buf[4096];
00037 
00038     dbg_err_if(src == NULL);
00039     dbg_err_if(dst == NULL);
00040 
00041     sfp = fopen(src, "rb");
00042     dbg_err_sifm(sfp == NULL, "unable to open %s for reading", src);
00043 
00044     dfp = fopen(dst, "wb+");
00045     dbg_err_sifm(dfp == NULL, "unable to open %s for writing", dst);
00046 
00047     while((c = fread(buf, 1, sizeof(buf), sfp)) > 0)
00048     {
00049         dbg_err_sifm(fwrite(buf, 1, c, dfp) == 0, "error writing to %s", dst);
00050     }
00051 
00052     dbg_err_sif(fclose(sfp)); sfp = NULL;
00053 
00054     dbg_err_sifm(fclose(dfp), "error flushing %s", dst); dfp = NULL;
00055 
00056     return 0;
00057 err:
00058     if(sfp)
00059         fclose(sfp);
00060     if(dfp)
00061         fclose(dfp);
00062     return ~0;
00063 }

00075 int u_move(const char *src, const char *dst)
00076 {
00077     int rc;
00078 
00079     dbg_err_if(src == NULL);
00080     dbg_err_if(dst == NULL);
00081 
00082 #ifdef HAVE_LINK
00083     dbg_err_sif((rc = link(src, dst)) < 0 && errno != EXDEV);
00084 
00085     if(rc && errno == EXDEV)
00086         dbg_err_if(u_copy(src, dst)); /* deep copy */
00087 #else
00088     u_unused_args(rc);
00089 
00090     dbg_err_if(u_copy(src, dst));
00091 #endif
00092 
00093     dbg_if(u_remove(src) < 0);
00094 
00095     return 0;
00096 err:
00097     return ~0;
00098 }
00099 
00109 int u_remove(const char *file)
00110 {
00111     dbg_err_if(file == NULL);
00112 
00113     dbg_err_sif(unlink(file) < 0);
00114 
00115     return 0;
00116 err:
00117     return ~0;
00118 }
